MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G45 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.09pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties on site at the Castledown substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:14PM on Wednesday 13 January 2021.
